actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on August 1, 2023.
The Chair designated Mr. Beyer to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Reverend Dorota Wright-Pruski, St Andrew's Episcopal Church, Arlington, Virginia.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
